title: Twisted Fate's ult allows him to see all enemies on the map.
body: But can he see why kids love the taste of Cinnamon Toast Crunch?

replies.body: {{champion:161}} Analysis indicates that that young form of Homo Sapiens enjoy this consumable because of its copious amounts of substances identified as 'sugar' and 'cinnamon'. I assure you, I can indeed view why said children greatly favor the taste sense of 'Cinnamon Toast Crunch'.
Vel'Koz smart AF.
{{champion:64}} I can see why they do
This champion knows his stuff.
Like if you read it in his voice
Best click bait ever.
Thats why I never click on a thread. I always just hover over it, then click when it ends up being really good
Upvote for being intelligent. ish.
I thought you were only on the skins and champions concepts boards, didn't know you visit memes and games.
I pop around.~
{{champion:4}} They're as shiny as my golden card?

> [{quoted}](name=ViceN53,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=baO1ExgE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-19T02:10:40.247+0000)
>
> {{champion:4}} They're as shiny as my golden card?

{{champion:31}} Cinnamon! {{champion:96}} Sugar! {{champion:161}} analyzed as a Swirly pattern in every bite

{{champion:4}} Oh. . . I see it now [Destiny][Gate]

[Smoke Screen][Collateral Damage]
"You have been slain!"

{{champion:104}} No, Partner. . . [Shotgun Pump] you don't see a thing
That escalated quickly...
but can he see why rammus only has 6 lines of dialogue?
{{champion:33}} Ok
alright
Yeah
Mm.
Hodor
ENCHANTMENT!

I'd like to think that's what he does when he's not battling.

He's using Destiny to look at cereal and wondering why he can't see the taste. It torments him endlessly.
Do they still run those commercials? I'm 28 and I remember that from when I was 5.

> [{quoted}](name=I Like Hugs,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=baO1ExgE,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-03-19T10:58:38.374+0000)
>
> Do they still run those commercials? I'm 28 and I remember that from when I was 5.

They still run the commercials.
Lee Sin sure can
New skin confirmed. Throws cinnamon squares.

Lee Sin may have been blinded in his self immolation as protest of the Noxian occupation of Ionia, but can he see why kids love the taste of Cinnamon Toast Crunch?

Lissandra may have been blinded by Ursine before becoming Iceborn and then destroying the remnants of the Watchers, but can she see why kids love the taste of Cinnamon Toast Crunch?

Nocturne may be able to see into your soul, but can he see why kids love the taste of Cinnamon Toast Crunch?

Vision Wards may be able to detect stealthed units in their radius, but can they see why kids love the taste of Cinnamon Toast Crunch?
Was expecting some broken in game bug or mechanic with a picture of a champion then I read the post. Good show my sides are in orbit.
Everytime i see something like this, my mind immediately goes to  this
Can he see how many licks does it take to get to the center of a Tootsie Pop?
{{champion:64}}  "I'll see this through."
Clever, I nostalgia'd.
LMFAO OMG THATS FRESH AS SHIT
A burst of cinnamon in every bite

Can he see them while in Graves's W(?)/ smokescreen?
It's a passive easter egg.
WHO DOESN'T. I had that cereal this morning, it's perfect(absolutely perfect for getting diabetes and obese)

That moment I decide to browse the LoL Boards... I find this. 10/10, props to you friend, props to you!
~~And unlike in Z Nation, this isn't sarcasm~~
Rofl! That wasn't what I was expecting to see when I pulled up the post.  +1 from me. ;)

Do kids today even understand what that means?

(I haven't watched television in 3 years so I don't know if those commercials run anymore)
Genius.
I cant tell if this is a hate on tf post.. or just a funny post, thumbs up for the joke tho
LOL
Cause kids in USA will eat even garbage if you give it to them with enough sugar and good advertising.

Hey. It's better than piling it up in some random place.

And besides. It's not cereal it's candy. ;)
{{sticker:sg-poppy}}
I'm a frosted flakes man myself
I know why they love it. Its because they ran out of Cap'n Crunch.
Taste those Crunchy Squares. . . that's the current Cinnamon Toast Crunch
Take my upvote.
Wow, been awhile since someone made this thread.
